A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I would rank this worse than The Force Awakens but Rotten Tomatoes don't have negative stars.  All the problems from TFA is multiplied ten fold.  Its 3 plots feel stupid\, drawn out scenes that cant build suspense.  "How/Why did that happen" and "did anyone watch the earlier movies" was my refrain

The Phantom Menace I feel had better special effects overall and better pacing

Has one decent fight scene
